success_criteria: Code coverage on new code > 80% (REQ-1-504). All unit & integration tests pass. Linter (Flake8, Black) checks pass. No new critical/high issues from SonarQube scan.
failure_action: Block merge. Post failure report to PR.
escalation_procedure: PR author is responsible for fixing. Tech Lead assists if blocked.
business_impact: Prevents defects and technical debt from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: Successful deployment to staging environment. Automated E2E smoke tests (critical path scenarios) pass.
failure_action: Rollback deployment. Create a P1 incident ticket. Alert DevOps and QA Lead.
escalation_procedure: DevOps Lead investigates deployment failure. QA Lead investigates test failure.
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment is always stable for UAT and further testing.

success_criteria: All high-priority E2E tests pass in staging. UAT completed and signed off by Product Owner. Performance tests are within benchmark. No open critical or high-severity bugs. Data migration dry-run validated and signed off.
failure_action: Abort production release. Schedule a go/no-go meeting.
business_impact: Prevents a defective or unstable release from reaching customers.
